channel.title: Comments for Nam Vu Personal Site

item.title: Comment on Setup a family printer with a Raspberry Pi 1, CUPS and Canon LBP 2900 by htl
item.dc:creator: htl
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2021/07/setup-a-family-printer-with-a-raspberry-pi-1-and-canon-lbp-2900/#comment-8788">Nam Vũ</a>.
Yes I can access CUPS WebUI normally. I see Print Jobs queue in WebUI but CAPT Status window on Windows 10 says "Printer Server Error": "The print server is down. Check the print server".
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nam Vũ.

Yes I can access CUPS WebUI normally. I see Print Jobs queue in WebUI but CAPT Status window on Windows 10 says “Printer Server Error”: “The print server is down. Check the print server”.

item.title: Comment on Setup a family printer with a Raspberry Pi 1, CUPS and Canon LBP 2900 by Stuart
item.dc:creator: Stuart

item.title: Comment on Setup a family printer with a Raspberry Pi 1, CUPS and Canon LBP 2900 by Jesús Molinero
item.dc:creator: Jesús Molinero
item.description:
Hi all. I followed step-by-step process but I'm struggled with Adding new printer. Canon LBP2900 doesn't appears as LOCAL Printer.
Just CUPS-BRF (Virtual Braille BRF Printer) VNC Remote Printer (VNC Printer) HP Printer (HPLIP)
Any help to have the Canon LBP2900 listed in Local Printers? Thanks in advance.
item.content:encoded:
Hi all.
I followed step-by-step process but I’m struggled with Adding new printer.
Canon LBP2900 doesn’t appears as LOCAL Printer.

Just
CUPS-BRF (Virtual Braille BRF Printer)
VNC Remote Printer (VNC Printer)
HP Printer (HPLIP)

Any help to have the Canon LBP2900 listed in Local Printers?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Comment on October 24, 2022 by Nam Vũ
item.dc:creator: Nam Vũ
item.description: Thank you for your kind words, they already made my days better. And my mom's health is already improving thanks to the new diet regimen that my and my sister made for her.
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for your kind words, they already made my days better.
And my mom’s health is already improving thanks to the new diet regimen that my and my sister made for her.

item.title: Comment on October 24, 2022 by Issam
item.dc:creator: Issam
item.description: Hope you and your mom are okay! Eat healthy and give her a lot of love! Hopefully she will be fine and live a long life!
item.content:encoded: Hope you and your mom are okay! Eat healthy and give her a lot of love! Hopefully she will be fine and live a long life!
